title: Engine overheating under load
symptoms: Related warning indicator may be on
causes: Wear or contamination beyond service limits
repair: Verify complaint and capture codes/measurements
Inspect visually for leaks, damage and loose connections
Test components against service manual specifications
Repair/replace faulty parts; torque to spec
Bleed/flush and recalibrate; road test and recheck
